title: How to Participate
intro: If you care about the environment, eating healthy, and living more consciously, this is your place. Here we share what we grow with respect for the land and exchange it through collaboration and trust. Together we create a more sustainable, supportive, and natural community.
signup_text: If you agree with our vision,
gardener_text: If you are a gardener, upload your products or services in the
consumer_text: If you are a consumer, contact the gardener who has published the product or service you are interested in to establish the exchange conditions between you.
disclaimer: This website does not charge commissions nor is it responsible for any aspect of the transaction between gardeners and consumers.
